HTMLElementHidePopover.summary: The hidePopover() method of the interface hides a {{domxref("Popover_API", "popover", "", "nocode")}} element (i.e. one that has a valid popover attribute) by removing it from the top layer and styling it with display: none.

remarks.para: When hidePopover() is called on a showing element with the popover attribute, a event will be fired, followed by the popover being hidden, and then the event firing. If the element is already hidden, an error is thrown.
